title: The Myth of the Cheaper Generic
description: This project visualizes price differences between generic and brand-name products across key categories at three major U.S. supermarket chains, helping users easily compare prices and make informed decisions.

title: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualization?
description: Visualizations designed to persuade can often be misleading. This project explores how the same data can be presented to convey opposing messages, using NYPD complaint data involving White and Black civilians as a case study.

title: Bike Watching
description: Bike Watching is an interactive visualization of bike arrivals and departures in Boston, built with the Mapbox API. By mapping bike activity with dynamic circle sizes, the project aims to highlight traffic patterns and support insights into urban mobility.

title: The Hidden Science of Sleep
description: Sleep Tracker is an interactive D3.js visualization that analyzes sleep data from 22 individuals. By exploring metrics like sleep efficiency, duration, hormone levels (melatonin, cortisol), stress, emotions, and daily activity, the project aims to uncover patterns and insights that help users understand and improve their sleep habits.

title: League of Legends Statistical Analysis
description: League of Legends Statistical Analysis uses a Random Forest classifier to predict match outcomes based on in-game stats like gold, kills, damage, and objectives. Interactive visualizations help users explore how these factors impact team performance.
